did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY
did.unittitle: Leonard R. Burgess "Status of Women in Academy of Management" Memoir, 1991
did.repository: Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: Entry from Academy of Management Human Resources Notebook dated August 20, 1976, as reported to the archives by letter to Leonard R. Burgess on April 12, 1991.

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p: This collection consists of an entry from Academy of Management Human Resources Notebook dated August 20, 1976, as reported to the archives by letter to Leonard R. Burgess on April 12, 1991.

accessrestrict.head: Access Restrictions:
accessrestrict.p: Access to the collections in the Kheel Center is restricted. Please contact a reference archivist for access to these materials.

userestrict.head: Restrictions on Use:
userestrict.p: This collection must be used in keeping with the Kheel Center Information Sheet and Procedures for Document Use.

prefercite.head: Cite As:
prefercite.p: Leonard R. Burgess "Status of Women in Academy of Management" Memoir #5893m. Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library.
